script:
1). Excuse me, do you know which road goes to Smallville?
No, sorry, I didn't know.
Sure, you know the way.
Yes, take State Route 50. 
2). Does this bus stop at 72nd Street?
The bus stop is around the corner.
No, it doesn't. It stops at 75th. 
Yes, it doesn't stop at 72nd.
3). What if Ms. Blowers is unavailable?
Then try Mr. Graham. 
Yes, she is.
No, she wouldn't be.
